item.description: http://www.facebook.c... Gather to share your plans, hash out strategies, hear the latest buzz, and get connected over food and drinks with fellow activists for liberty. Stickers and signs will be available. We'll be there until at least 9 so no worries if you can't get there for 6. List of discussion topics tentatively includes: -August 20 New Hampshire straw poll / pub crawl recap -Boston pub craw planning -More outreach to independents / anti-war community -September debate watching and signwaving -September 17 Moneybomb Find us upstairs.
item.name: Boston Ron Paul Weeknight Meeting & Social
